properties.name: badge
properties.description: Additional icon provided to indicate special kind of tabs. E.g. typed dashboards.
properties.rawdescription: Additional icon provided to indicate special kind of tabs. E.g. typed dashboards.

properties.name: featureId
properties.rawdescription: Id to identify specific feature tab.

properties.name: injector
properties.description: The injector to use. If not set, the default root injector will be used.
properties.rawdescription: The injector to use. If not set, the default root injector will be used.

properties.name: priority
properties.rawdescription: Ordering of the tabs (high number first) (optional)

properties.name: showAlways
properties.description: If there is just a single tab for a route the tab will not be show. If you set this flag to true the tab is still going to be shown even if it is the only one.
properties.rawdescription:
If there is just a single tab for a route the tab will not be show.
If you set this flag to true the tab is still going to be shown even if it is the only one.

properties.name: tabsOutlet
properties.description: Name of the tab outlet which the tabs will use. E.g. can be used to display inline tabs.
properties.rawdescription: Name of the tab outlet which the tabs will use. E.g. can be used to display inline tabs.

properties.name: tooltipText
properties.description: Additional description which can be added to the tab.
properties.rawdescription: Additional description which can be added to the tab.
